metadata.title: CVE-2022-30122 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A possible denial of service vulnerability exists in Rack <2.0.9.1,<2.1.4.1 and <2.2.3.1 in the multipart parsing component of Rack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-rack - 1.6.4-4ubuntu0.2+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.4-4ubuntu0.2+esm2').
